result.name: central-payment-system-reports
result.notes:
Customer level details of payment rejection reports generated by the departments main system payment system, Central Payment System.
Location: GB and Northern Ireland
Time Period: Records held for up to 7 years to comply with Financial Regulations
Update Frequency: A/C updated based on customer payment cycle e.g. weekly
Data: Includes Customer Account details, Names, National Insurance Numbers, Bank A/C details

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Central Payment System Reports

extras.value: Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
